synopsis:
Eternia celebrates Teena as its new Man-At-Arms, but the knighting ceremony is cut short when Skeletor leads a full-scale assault on Grayskull.

(Source: Netflix)

Now mercenaries, Teela and her partner accept a job from a mysterious woman: to retrieve an old goblet from deep within Snake Mountain.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: The Most Dangerous Man in Eternia

synopsis:
While defending a village from Tri-Klop's cult, Teela's group meets Man-At-Arms, who is struggling to keep Orko alive using the town's magic water.

(Source: Netflix)

Separated from her companions in Subternia, Teela faces a sinister entity who offers her half of the Sword of Power in exchange for her fears.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: The Forge at the Forest of Forever

synopsis:
A familiar figure warns Teela and the others that there may be no escape from Preternia. Roboto risks his mechanical body to reforge the Sword of Power.

(Source: Netflix)
